metadata.description: Premium marketplace for revolutionary autonomous AI agents featuring four-tier architecture, intelligent pattern learning, comprehensive quality control, and full-stack validation with 80-90% auto-fix success rates.

plugins.name: autonomous-agent
plugins.description: Revolutionary four-tier agent architecture with 31 specialized agents, 23 skills, and 42 commands. NEW in v7.16.5: Hybrid research architecture - main thread performs WebSearch/WebFetch, specialized agents analyze content and provide iterative feedback for refined searches. Research commands now ACTUALLY search the web (fixed Claude Code sub-agent WebSearch limitation). v7.16.0: Enhanced design intelligence based on official Claude research. v7.15.0: Comprehensive research capabilities with quality scoring. Features pattern learning, quality control, full-stack validation, intelligent automation, and 80-90% auto-fix success. Production ready with 60-70% token cost reduction and fully autonomous operation.
